Posts.EditableText: A beta version of the Squiffy Editor is now live. You can now create and publish games with Squiffy, entirely with your web browser. Try it out here: http://textadventures.co.uk/create - there's a new button to create a Squiffy game. You can also use it without logging in: http://textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/editor Give it a go and let me know if anything breaks. I'll publicise this more widely soon!
Posts.HTML:
A beta version of the Squiffy Editor is now live. You can now create and publish games with Squiffy, entirely with your web browser.

Try it out here: http://textadventures.co.uk/create - there's a new button to create a Squiffy game.

You can also use it without logging in: http://textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/editor

Give it a go and let me know if anything breaks. I'll publicise this more widely soon!

Posts.EditableText: I've now updated the editor to add drop-downs for navigating between sections and passages, and this is now officially Squiffy 3. Check it out!
Posts.HTML: I've now updated the editor to add drop-downs for navigating between sections and passages, and this is now officially Squiffy 3. Check it out!

Posts.EditableText: Hi. I've only recently started using Squiffy. I just wanted to say being able to create and publish text games so easily in the browser is a great idea, and the software is so easy to use. Nice work. That's all I wanted to say, really.
